---
name: Security
about: Report Vulnerability
title: "[Security]"
labels: security
assignees: Daynlight

---

This issue template is intended **exclusively for reporting potential security vulnerabilities** in the Graphite project.
It helps maintainers receive the necessary information in a structured, private-friendly way so we can quickly assess, verify, and resolve security issues.

Please avoid sharing sensitive exploit details publicly.
If your report involves sensitive information, send full details to **[danielstodulski000@gmail.com](mailto:danielstodulski000@gmail.com)** and reference that email submission in this issue.
